solution_line_template: Sheila will be saving for {years} years which is equivalent to {months_per_year} months/year * {years} years = <<{months_per_year}*{years}={total_months}>>{total_months} months
In 4 years, she will save ${monthly_saving}/month * {total_months} months = $<<{monthly_saving}*{total_months}={sheila_future_saving}>>{sheila_future_saving}
The piggy bank will have a total of ${initial_total} + ${sheila_future_saving} = $<<{initial_total}+{sheila_future_saving}={final_total}>>{final_total}
